testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/High Resolution Time
testcase.purpose: Check if the window.performance.now() returns a positive number

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/High Resolution Time
testcase.purpose: Check if the window.performance.now() difference is not negative

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/High Resolution Time
testcase.purpose: Check if the parent performance.now() is greater than 0

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/High Resolution Time
testcase.purpose: Check if the child performance.now() is greater than 0

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/High Resolution Time
testcase.purpose: Check if the child performance.now() created at least 1 second after parent performance.now()

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/High Resolution Time
testcase.purpose: Check if the values of the window.performance.now() are based on the current document's navigationStart
